page.title: 02Saturday am.in N.Wingfield
page.content: On Saturday mornings I wake up at about 8.30.I get dressed,go downstairs and have cornflakes.After that I used to play on my bike but I can't now because my bike is in pieces.So now I usually go and wake up my brother and we have a game of football across from my house.At about 10.30 I call for Paul Vickers and he and I call for Christopher Gratton.Then we play football on the school field.As there are only 3 of us I borrow Andrew Bailey's bike to collect some more friends.When we start the game of football it is nearly always 4th years against 3rd years.Matthew always wants to play centre-attack and I always want to play centre-midfield because that is my favourite position. Jon Needham aged 11
